While a clinically positive axilla may suggest that the cancer has already spread to the lymph nodes, it is not necessarily a contraindication to SLNB. However, the American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) guidelines recommend that patients with clinically positive axilla should undergo axillary lymph node dissection (ALND) instead of SLNB.
